actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The badger makes one Bite attack and one Claws attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 4 (1d6+1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 3 (1d4+1) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Grumpy
special_abilities.desc: When in combat, the badger attacks the creature that most recently dealt damage to it, provided that creature is within range or moving to it doesn't cause the badger to provoke opportunity attacks. The badger otherwise attacks the nearest hostile creature.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Smell
special_abilities.desc: The badger's Perception is 16 when perceiving by smell.
